name: IntersexSurgeryMaleToFemaleSex
title: Intersex Surgery, Male to Female Sex
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set focuses on surgical procedures performed on individuals with variations in sex development to create a more feminine physical appearance, aligning with a female gender identity. It captures the intent of the surgery and the desired outcome.),(Data Element Scope: This data element captures surgical interventions on individuals aiming to achieve a female phenotype. It provides a more specific categorization than "Intersex Surgery, Non-specific."),(Inclusion Criteria: Intersex Surgery, Male to Female Sex),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set does not capture details about the specific procedures performed (e.g., vaginoplasty, clitoroplasty, breast augmentation).
It excludes information on the age at surgery, the reason for surgery, or the surgeon's intent beyond the male-to-female direction.
It does not record any potential complications or outcomes of the surgery.)
